notes: This toolkit comprises the tools and supporting scripts for unsupervised induction of dependency trees from raw texts or texts with already assigned part-of-speech tags. There are also scripts for simple machine translation based on unsupervised parsing and scripts for minimally supervised parsing into Universal-Dependencies style.
title: LiStr: Linguistic Structure Induction Tookit
